categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Kantale was a male Sith who held the title of Sith Lord in the reconstituted Sith Empire before he joined the radicalized Order of Revan during the Galactic War. Kantale was among the Revanite commanders who led the Revanite forces in defense of the Temple of Sacrifice during the battle on Yavin 4, and was slain on the grounds of the Imperial Guard Academy by forces from the Imperial-Republic Yavin Coalition.

Lord Kantale appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan, a 2014 Digital Expansion for the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, and is one four named enemies that must be defeated by players in the mission "The Enemy Within."
